participant_2.background:
My worst nightmare is that my dog Petrucci will die.
My eye contact issues can get in the way of my work, but I'm trying my best to overcome them.
i used to wear glasses as a child.
i work at a factory.
My favorite type of food is locally sourced, organic food.

content.text: Hi there! How are you doing?
I am doing well, thank you! I met a really interesting person at the coffee shop last week.
Oh that sounds fun! What did you talk about?
We talked about a lot of things, but mostly about our families.
Oh that's nice! I love hearing about other people's families.
Me too! I'm proud of my ability to persevere through difficult times and continue to succeed in my career.
That's great! I'm glad to hear that you're doing well.
Thank you! What about you? What do you like to do for fun?
I love to read, go on walks with my dog, and cook.
Oh that sounds nice! I love to read too. What's your favorite book?
That's a tough question! I have a lot of favorites. But I think one of my favorites is "The Great Gatsby" by F. Scott Fitzgerald.
I love that book! It's so sad, but so beautiful.
Yes, it is! I love the way he writes about the American Dream.
What about you? What's your favorite book?
